bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.imlementations

Class Reaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.ConcentrationBasedModule<SectionDeltaFunction>
      • bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.imlementations.Reaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MichaelisMentenReaction, NthOrderReaction, ReversibleReaction

    public abstract class Reaction
extends ConcentrationBasedModule<SectionDeltaFunction>
    Reactions in general are ConcentrationBasedModules following the laws of chemical kinetics. The calculation of the velocity is defined by the concrete implementation of this module.
    See Also:
    ReversibleReaction, MichaelisMentenReaction, NthOrderReaction
